content: Offer a list of 15 words that include 'umb' within them.

I'm here to help! Here are 15 words that include "umb" within them:

1. Umbrella
2. Umbilical
3. Umbrageous
4. Umbra
5. Umbrette
6. Umbrage
7. Umber
8. Umbel
9. Umbrageously
10. Umbilicus
11. Umbrageousness
12. Umbilical cord
13. Umbrageousnesses
14. Umbilicariaceae
15. Umbilicaria

I hope this list meets your needs! If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask.
